columns.name: namespace_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the namespace

columns.name: admin_username
columns.description: The username of the administrator for the first database created in the namespace.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The creation date of the namespace.

columns.name: db_name
columns.description: The name of the first database created in the namespace.

columns.name: default_iam_role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to set as a default in the namespace.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service key used to encrypt your data.

columns.name: iam_roles
columns.description: A list of IAM roles to associate with the namespace.

columns.name: log_exports
columns.description: The types of logs the namespace can export. Available export types are User log, Connection log, and User activity log.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The list of tags for the namespace.
